Package fr.uge.patchwork.controller

Interface Game

public interface Game
Class containing all controller methods of the game.

      Controller method to start the game loop with the necessary parameters.

    • status

      static void status(Player player1, Player player2, PieceSet pieceList, TimeBoard timeBoard)
      Controller method to display the status of the game.
      Parameters:
      player1 - : player 1
      player2 - : player 2
      pieceList - : list of pieces
      timeBoard - : game board

    • progress

      static void progress(PieceSet pieceList, Map<Integer,Player> players, TimeBoard timeBoard, String gameVersion)
      Controller method to manage the game loop.
      Parameters:
      pieceList - : list of pieces
      players - : Map of players by ID
      timeBoard - : game board
      gameVersion - : version of the game

    • buy

      static void buy(PieceSet pieceList, Map<Integer,Player> players, TimeBoard timeBoard, int idPlayerPrior)
      Controller method to manage the case where the player wants to buy a piece.
      Parameters:
      pieceList - : list of pieces
      players - : Map of players by ID
      timeBoard - : game board
      idPlayerPrior - : ID of the player who must play

    • overtake

      Parameters:
      players - : players Map by ID
      timeBoard - : game board
      idPlayerPrior - : ID of the player who must play

    • reward

      static void reward(Map<Integer,Player> players, int buttonsCrossed, int patchesEarned, int idPlayerPrior)
      Controller method to manage the case where the player is rewarded with patches.
      Parameters:
      players - : players Map by ID
      buttonsCrossed - : number of buttons crossed
      patchesEarned - : number of patches earned
      idPlayerPrior - : ID of the player who must play
